author: vines
msg: Accumulo-82 - rat checks now in place. It does have a dependency on an unreleased version of rat, but it's fairly easy to do an install of it. Checks are only does in a specific profile, so it should not be considered broken.
Also, config.html is dynamically generated, so it should no longer be in svn.
